live_updates: Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates. A further update will be provided at 11:18 MT.
60129.summary: Some customers in the Killarney area of Edmonton are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
60129.title: Apr 14 - Edmonton (Killarney) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
